title: Mord
body: I love the juggernaut class and mord is the last big one and I need some tips for him

replies.body:
First, Look at him.
Second, realize everyone is better than him since they gutted him way back when.
Third, pick someone else and remissness about the days when he was viable, and slight cry on the inside wishing he was good again
Wait for him to get some kind of buff soon, he needs it.
The best way to play morde, is to not play him.
